course_title: TechTool: Level-Up your Presentation Skills with Miro & Canva
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 250 / Seats Avail: 2Waitlist Total: 0
course_description: Learn how to use Miro--an online communication, project management, and collaboration platform, and Canva - an online graphic design tool, to take your presentation skills to the next level. This course will explore how these tech tools can support and enhance your presentation planning with storyboarding techniques, as well as cover collaboration, design, and delivery strategies. Software purchase may be required.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
sections: Class Nbr: 5346, Section #: 1101, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: S. Adams, Status: Open
